mapper.select: SELECT ID as "id" , TITLE as "title" , CONTENT as "content" , READ_COUNT as "readCount" , PARENT_ID as "parentId" , REPLY_ID as "replyId" , ATTACH_ID as "attachId" , PASSWORD as "password" , CRE_BY as "creBy" , CRE_DT as "creDt" , MOD_BY as "modBy" , MOD_DT as "modDt" FROM TB_TEST_BOARD
